episodes.title: The Church of Scientology tried to Destroy Her: Paulette Cooper
episodes.description:
00:00-2:44 Introduction
2:44-10:32 Introduction to the World Scientology/Fair Game Policy
10:32-17:08 Paulette Cooper Bio
17:08-23:41  Paulette’s article and book 
23:41-34:56 Operation Lovely
34:56-39:00 Operation Freakout
39:00-42:28 The truth comes out
42:28-47:36 The saga finally ends
47:36-53:15 Conclusion

Hey Friends and Family

Today’s video is about the Paulette Cooper and her decades long battle against the Church of Scientology. The video is very long so be prepared to buckle in.

I know I’ve said this channel is going to explore true crime cases committed by religious fundamentalists, but I also want to cover cults on this channel. This is also a detour from murder so I hope everyone still enjoys it.

Please watch and comment, and if you like it, please subscribe. Thank you!

Sources:
